definition: The term "schmerzhaft" refers to an adjective that describes a sensation or experience that is associated with physical or emotional pain. It is commonly used to describe something that causes discomfort, anguish, or suffering.

examples.german: Die Wunde heilt langsam und schmerzhaft.
examples.english: The wound is healing slowly and painfully.

examples.german: Der Verlust eines geliebten Menschen ist schmerzhaft.
examples.english: The loss of a loved one is painful.

examples.german: Die schmerzhafte Erinnerung an den Unfall wird mich immer begleiten.
examples.english: The painful memory of the accident will always haunt me.

examples.german: Die schmerzhafte Wahrheit ist schwer zu akzeptieren.
examples.english: The painful truth is hard to accept.
